name: Pain(t) Away
description:
Pain(t) Away

After spending a lot of time locked in you home, you are ready to get your life into order again by doing what you love - painting. Will you be able to paint your pain away? 

P̷̫͘a̶̲̅î̵͖n̷̠̾t̶͎̅.̸̳͊ ̷̱̓P̷̧̀A̴̜̕Í̶͎N̸̲̾Ṭ̶͆!̸̰͂ ̶͕̕P̸̫̓ä̶̲́i̷̯͋n̴͈̒.̷̘̕ ̶͓̏D̸͈̕ö̴͈́n̶̬̄’̷̠̍t̸͎̑ ̷̭̈w̴̰̓o̴̮̔r̶̪̈́ṛ̶̛y̵̳̋.̶̱̿ ̵̪̋E̴̊ͅv̸̠̂e̷̤̍r̵̪͆y̶̮̏t̶͚͘h̶͕̑ȉ̶̺n̵̯̂g̶͊͜ ̷̰̚i̶͍̅ ̸̡̎s̸͔̐ ̶̟̀F̷̳͋ ̵͔́I̷̲̎ ̴̭͠n̴̾͜ ̷̗̏Ë̵͎́.̶̞̈́ ̷͙͝T̵̞̃Ḫ̵͠E̷͎̊Y̶͈̅ ̶͉̾á̵̜ṛ̶͛ẽ̴̺ ̴̘̐N̴̘͆O̷̤͗T̵̙͝ ̵̼̚r̸̠̓ ̸͔̓ȩ̸͂ ̴̢͆ ̶̦͑ ̸͍̇ă̸͎ ̵̘̍ ̵͉̽ ̶̦̒l̵͍̈́.̶̞̓

How to play?

  • Paint by holding the left mouse button.
  • Skip the dialog with Space.
  • Monday is only an introductory day.

Otherwise, the game is pretty self-explanatory. Don’t forget to remain calm. Ṭ̷͝ḧ̴̨e̵͕̐y̸̛̤ ̷̮̿c̸̓ͅȁ̷͎n̵̫̈n̵̳͘o̴͍͆t̸̝̑ ̷̦̇ḧ̵͎u̴͔͑r̸̺̋t̷͚̄ ̸̰̈́y̸̳̌o̷̗̐ù̷͉.̴̪̄

Source code

This game is open source. So, if you want to see my spaghetti, you will find everything here - https://github.com/dzejpi/paint-away/.

You will need:

  • Game Maker 2 - for the game project.

Made only from Kenney assets. Forgive me, Kenney, for violating them in such a way.

Gameplay: less than 15 minutes.
